alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued January 01 at 2:21AM PST until January 03 at 11:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Elevated surf is expected this morning with surf of 4 to 6 feet with local sets to 7 feet mainly over San Diego County. This surf will subside by tonight. Astronomical high tides of 7 to 7.5 feet are expected each morning today through Monday. * WHERE...Orange County Coastal Areas and San Diego County Coastal Areas. * WHEN...Elevated surf expected today. Tidal impacts each morning through Monday morning around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...The morning high tides could result in minor tidal overflow, bringing some ponding of sea water to favored low- lying areas. Impacts are not expected to be significant.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas
